alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 2:36AM CDT until April 05 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... St. Clair County in west central Missouri... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 236 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Walker, or near Nevada, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Truman Lake, Appleton City, Osceola, Lowry City, Roscoe, Vista, Tiffin, Johnson City, Taberville, Iconium and Monegaw Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
